welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Donna, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our vibrant community and experiencing all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport serves as a hub for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valley International Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Valley International Airport is used for smaller regional flights and offers a more intimate and convenient travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
